name: A Journey to be free
description: A Story about a little girl's promise, to bring her pet goldfish to a local river so she could free him into the ocean... A Journey to be free !                                                           Run through the villages and fields of Japan and reach the river at the end of the game! But watch out!! On your journey you run across stray cats... and those seem to be especially interested in your bestfriend! Controls for both Keyboard and Gamepad  Move Left and Right - A , D  or  Left Joystick  Jump - Space  or  South Button Look Up and Down - W , S  or  D-Pad Interact - E  or  East Button Pause Game - P  or  Start Button Music and SFX are from Epidemic Sounds (if you're interested in one of them) Thank you so much for playing and feel free to comment! :)
